title: ranegg
author: ranegg
created_time: June 09, 2023, 11:09:16 AMLast edit: November 16, 2024, 01:15:47 PM by ranegg

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.I see that you have already purchased copper membership which means that you can post images on the forum. Since can already post images here you should consider editing your Op and add some images to make it look more like an ANN thread, right now I don't think alot of people might take your site seriously cause there's nothing here about your site just a thread with less than 50 words. You should be aware that the casino industry is a competitive one, you should try to make yours stand out right now you're trying to win potential customers to your thread but if you don't show sign of seriousness no one will take you to be serious.Just a little suggestion; look through the service board find someone who does professional ANN design pay them let them design something good for you... You can just come to bitcointalk drop few words and expect everyone to jump into your casino.  I haven't check your site I might come back to this thread when I'm through checking it out, for now.make sure you work on this thread make it look more appealing to the eyes.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I confess that when I saw the title of the thread I thought I was dealing with yet another new casino, but when I entered your site I realized that it is a site that makes casinos, so why don't you specify that in your thread, you should also put all the details of the services you offer in this thread because with that people will be able to read here and ask you questions than they still have to go to your site and search and not understand anything, for example I saw prices of Basic Limited features for $899 I guess the person would be paying you to create a limited features casinoif that's the case should you also mention how long you take to deliver the product, what guarantee will people have that you won't just steal people's money after they pay? so you could choose an escrow on this forum and with that your customers would already feel safe doing business with you, I also saw that you accept paypal payments, and your Frequently Asked Queries is kind of very brief, but I didn't see your TOS, so I I suppose that on your site there is not something very important that is the TOS, but anyway I hope you put all the details in this thread, mainly about the past works that you have already created because it will be very important for people to see

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on June 09, 2023, 11:09:16 AMYou can buy the source code on rakeclub.comYou are basically selling the script if anyone wants to run a gambling site. I visit this site to know about it , especially the price details and I found this and decided to post it here so everyone knows the price before they show any interest in buying.This is not cheap by any means, plus we will need additional money to facilitate the players who win at our site. Also this 900$ do not include the domain and hosting stuff? Do you have a complete case study as to how much total investment will be needed to set up the gambling casino and what will be the ROI?

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on June 09, 2023, 11:09:16 AM<snip>A decent product. Functional. However, I think you should only allow integer or/ double to the bet amount input fields as currently any data type can be accepted as an input. You might also want to add a maxlength on those areas. So, rakeclub.com is a casino solutions... I think you should move this thread to the Services board, you can found the button for that from the lower left part of this thread.Another opinion, it would be better if you will use icons for your social media accounts for this thread instead of using pure texts. Welcome to the forum, good luck!

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on June 11, 2023, 02:09:52 PMQuote from: ranegg on June 09, 2023, 11:09:16 AMYou can buy the source code on rakeclub.comYou are basically selling the script if anyone wants to run a gambling site. I visit this site to know about it , especially the price details and I found this and decided to post it here so everyone knows the price before they show any interest in buying.This is not cheap by any means, plus we will need additional money to facilitate the players who win at our site. Also this 900$ do not include the domain and hosting stuff? Actually, that amount is already fair price since his script is for a full casino features. It’s not the typical dice and crash script that usually cost cheaper than this. Typically, domain and hosting should be setup by the owner. I’m more curious if he support assistance on acquiring casino license and how many customers that avail his script already.Quote from: ranegg on June 11, 2023, 03:44:23 PMThank you very much for your feedback. I really appreciate it. I am still working on my thread as I want it to make everything as clear as possible. Really appreciate the help and the tips.  Use canva to improve your ANN thread. There’s a lot of templates in canva that can help you improve your ann thread presentation effectively. Use escrow on your deals to guarantee the safety of your buyer since you are still a newbie.

comments.author: slapper
comments.body: Awesome, you've got copper membership - now, put those image-posting skills to use. Make your thread an ANN lookalike by adding pictures and info about your unique casino creation platform. It's a tight race in the casino world. To stand out, you may need a pro for your ANN design. Don't forget to add practical stuff like allowing only integer or double bets, and pop in some social media icons. Clear up any confusion about payment and delivery. For your Basic Limited features costing $899, spell out the delivery timeline and offer buyer protection through a trusted escrow. An easy-to-understand FAQ and TOS will help build trust

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Welcome to our Bitcointalk forum! Enjoy your stay and our exentric community! Also, congrats to on your copper membership! Now that you are allowed to post pictures, perhaps you should make a detailed and informative ANN infographic which shows exactly what you are offering, as well as the conditions of your offer.As I understand it, you are simply offering the script? Has it been audited for functionality and security?

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Good luck trying to sell this script to 1000 people, who will have to run similar looking casinos afterwards. Maybe there is a way to adjust the web design and the different features, so that this casino template won't look the same for every buyer.I'm not a programmer or a web designer, I assume that many people, who want to start a gambling business won't have knowledge and skills about web design and programming.The template looks OK, but in the gambling world you have to stand out from the competition. I don't know how buying a pre-made script would make anyone stand out from the competition.Anyway, good luck with this project, OP.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Great idea but I don't think it will easy for people especially  from the forum to patronize  you because of the recent scams and hence people wouldn't want to deal without an escrow with a newbie account offering  a relatively  new service.I want to also suggest that you get someone  who can help you design your ANN  thread and also possibly get a much more reputable member who will help represent your team over here and help manage your services because I believe this is one of the only ways you can gain the trust of people to patronize you. Welcome on board and it will be nice you stay transparent in all your dealings in the forum  and beyond.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on June 14, 2023, 04:12:19 AMThis is the thing that you need to work on, that is you still don't have customer for your script. Rest, you have good casino source code, price is also optimal as per your own words but still you are unable to find any customers.It's not easy to find customer-finding casino software even outside this forum. That's why other's are hiring some agent, affiliate, ads on gambling-related blogs/list/ etc. to make it work. Patience is virtue.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: I thought this is another rakeback affiliate program scam because of your website domain. I think you should make the source code word first on the title before your domain because they doesn't blend in that much that you are selling a casino code instead of a rakeback services which many services here that attempts to scam user.Also include the payment method in your ANN thread and its best if you will accept Bitcoin since most of the user here that potentially your customers use Bitcoin. Lastly, Are you willing to accept escrow on the payment since no one will trust you here to pay you first since you are newbie. Wish you a good luck on your ventures. 🙏

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: I think the main concern that I want you to address is this ==> Security There are some dodgy developers out there and they also provide "White label" scripts like your site. These guys sells you a script for a casino, loaded with backdoors in the code to grant them access to your site. What garantee can you give people that your code is "backdoor free"? Can the code be third party tested to confirm that it is legit and without any backdoors?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on June 11, 2023, 03:44:23 PMThank you very much for your feedback. I really appreciate it. I am still working on my thread as I want it to make everything as clear as possible. Really appreciate the help and the tips.  I think the best move will be to have an escrow who will act between you and your buyer as a trust factor. You are new in the community, people will hesitate to trust your product, in case you do not deliver it as explained. An escrow with a fees will ensure safe practice of the terms between you and your client.In my old days, I trusted many script providers and some of them just ran away with the money without keeping the promises they made. In the wild internet area, it's hard to trust someone who do not have a solid background of conducting business.

I am still working on my thread as I want it to make everything as clear as possible. You are new in the community, people will hesitate to trust your product, in case you do not deliver it as explained. An escrow with a fees will ensure safe practice of the terms between you and your client.In my old days, I trusted many script providers and some of them just ran away with the money without keeping the promises they made. In the wild internet area, it's hard to trust someone who do not have a solid background of conducting business.first and foremost, this should be under the services section, if i am not mistaken. in any case, i don't think the OP can really attract some buyers from the forum. that is true, if you do want to set-up a business, you would want someone close to you to hire this kind of job. because later on, you may be wasting your resources for nothing. it may be easy to set-up, but the worry of most is the bankroll that you need to sustain the operations. if you want to stay long on this business, you will find out that you will spend a lot of money with other aspects of this business as well.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: ranegg on July 02, 2023, 06:16:39 PMYou can find all our prices on our website. Make sure to contact me if you are interested and check out the demo site.Are you reading the responses of just pumping posts LOLQuote from: AmoreJaz on July 02, 2023, 11:01:13 PMfirst and foremost, this should be under the services section, if i am not mistaken.Anything that is meant to be sell or trade for bitcoin, should be in the Service section.Quoteit may be easy to set-up, but the worry of most is the bankroll that you need to sustain the operations. if you want to stay long on this business, you will find out that you will spend a lot of money with other aspects of this business as well. Someone who have large amount of Bankroll, I don't think they will consider risking their business with a cheap script which later on will be impossible to upgrade.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: I recently bought the script and I have a few things to mention:1. How to setup tutorial is included (you can install this script basically without any linux knowledge)2. The script runs without any memory leaks3. Code looks clean and understandable (easily to be edited and further advanced)4. The design is also pretty easy to editAll in all, I can absolutely recommend the source code and the seller, he is helping whenenver you need any help.

comments.author: rkmf
comments.created_time: August 30, 2024, 02:03:01 PMLast edit: August 31, 2024, 09:47:01 AM by rkmf
comments.body: Stop trying to sell your cheap ass 'crypto casino' source code. You're using leaked code, and you're not serious. I also don't recommend anyone buy this; you can find the entire source code for free on GitHub. Just search for it, and you'll find it. Also, the crash game is completely stolen from cups.gg, which has since closed, but you can still search for them and see it's exactly the same. Their Twitter account still exists: https://twitter.com/cupsgg.https://github.com/PostalPanda/CustomCups
